manawa ayithiwasikam kshetha්raye thamanta wishala athdakim sambharayak athi nisa pasugiya mahinda rajapaksha rajya samaya jiniwa manawa ayithiwasikam komisama niyojanaya kirima sandaha thaman yoda gath bawath, thaman ema rajaye amathiwarayekuwa sitiyadith ema rajaye widesha pa්rathipaththiya wiwechanayata lak kirima nisath, mahinda rajapaksha mahathata awashya widihata thamanwa palanaya kirimata nohakiwima hethukota genath ohuta awashya widihata thaman batahira ratawal wiwechanayata lak nokala nisath thaman esema rajya nowana wideshiya sanwidhana samaga thamanta athi sambandhatha nisath thamanta ema rajaye widesha amathya dhuraya labadimata katayuthu nokala bawa da pa්rakasha kala amathyawaraya ema karunuwala pa්rathipalak lesa jiniwa manawa ayithiwasikam komisama sha්ri lankawata erehi wu bawa da pa්rakasha kaleya.

jathika paramadhipathya sahitha wyawasthawak gena eema sandaha wyawastha mandalayak path karana bawa ethumiya prathignya dunna. 1994di chandrika mathiniya eda thama maniyange prarthanaya helidaraw karamin widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya ahosi karana bawata prathignya dunna. 1978 sita me ratata shapayak wu widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya ahosi karana bawa aya pawasuwath ee ekakwath siduwuye naha. an. am eda pothak liwwa me wyawasthawen rata eekadhipathiwadaya kara yana aakaraya pilibandawa.
